name: LONG-TERM HEMODIALYSIS CATHETERS
description:
## CHARACTERISTICS
- The Catheter is made from premium silicone, which has excellent biocompatibility.
- The Dacron cuff helps keep the catheter from slipping out and reduce the chance of CBI (Catheter Related Bloodstream Infections.
- The silicone material makes catheter more floppy, hence it can minimize the trauma to the vein and reduce the incident of clot.
- Unique catheter design.

## STANDARD KITS INCLUDE
- Silicone Catheter
- Vessel Dilator
- Valved Peelable Introducer
- Introducer Needle
- Guide-wire
- Subcutaneous Tunnel needle
- Adhesive Wound Dressings
- Herparin Caps
- Gauze Sponges
- Scalpel
- Syringe
- Needle with Suture
tableInMd:
| Lumen | Catheter Size (Fr) | Catheter Length (cm) |
|---|---|---|
| Double Lumen | 15Fr | 13/19/23/28/31/33/35/50cm |
